General.Name: Nordic American Tankers Ltd.
General.Description: Nordic American Tankers Limited, a tanker company, acquires and charters double-hull tankers in Bermuda and internationally. It operates a fleet of 19 Suezmax crude oil tankers. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

2.Name: Mr. Jan H. A. Møller
2.Title: Head of Investor Relations and Financial Mang.
